summary: BRAKE ROTORS WARPED AT LESS THAN 12,000 MILES.  LOCAL DEALER TURNED ROTORS AT A LITTLE OVER 12,000 MILES.  THE SEVERE VIBRATION STARTED AGAIN AT APPROXIMATELY 24,000 MILES .  AT 38000 MILES I HAD FRONT BRAKE ROTORS AND PADS REPLACED BY LOCAL INDEPENDENT GARAGE. AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS THIS IS A BAD PROBLEM YOU CAN BARLEY HOLD STEERING WHEEL. *JB
